entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student who is weak and has been affected by dementors.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is concerned about his well-being.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who is also worried about him.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Frightening creatures that are guarding the gates to the castle.

entities.name: stagecoaches
entities.description: A group of coaches that are waiting for the students.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The destination where the students are headed.

relationships.description: Harry is frightened by the dementors.
Ron is concerned about Harry's well-being.
Hermione is also worried about Harry.
The stagecoaches are transporting the students.
The castle is guarded by dementors.
